channel.title: m2 on Vinnie's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in m2 on Vinnie's Blog

item.title: Beginning with Maven and M2
item.description: Apache Maven, in my opinion, is one of the most controversial tools around. From my experience, there are three kinds of developers today: those that never heard about Maven, those that hate it and those that can’t live without it. For a long time I was in the second group and I just recently turned to the third one, and I’m slowly dragging all my fellow programmers with me!
